title: Anyone find this a bit odd?
body:
So according to Shyvana's lore her father's a dragon and her mother's a human, only one I thing I gotta say about this..... the poor wife bro, honeymoon was either awkward or just painful. XD

But in all seriousness, I do wonder what would drive a person to have a kid with a dragon, but that makes me wonder, was Shyvana born live or through an egg being laid, idk why this suddenly popped up in my head, but fml XD

replies.body: Find the belly button.  If she has one its live and if not it was egg.

There is a large number of dragon stories that state they have innate magic that allows them to shapeshift. I would assume this is the case.

Also lightdragoon did his first Sale story based on Shyvana x Jarvan IV. :P He claims eggs.
